00047 static void deformVerts(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00048                         DerivedMesh *UNUSED(derivedData),
00049                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00050                         int numVerts,
00051                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00052                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00053 {
00054     sbObjectStep(md->scene, ob, (float)md->scene->r.cfra, vertexCos, numVerts);
00055 }
